name: Clock (nlbi21)
description:
Entry to Ludum Dare #36, work all alone, the game did not become what I wanted, I believe this to 40% to finish something fairly playable and fun. But I'm very happy I learned much more.

--Controls --
E - Interact with things and get resources (keep the button pressed for sleep, crafting and drink water).
WASD or arrow keys to move.
Space - Jump. (You can jump twice, jumping to the wall, also grab the edges.)
1 or 2 - For change Weapons, 1 for melee and 2 for range attack.
Left click or left ctrl - for attack.

If you like you can see on this link.
